scenario_text.value: Oh, Takuma. Perfect timing.
Is something wrong, Falcomon?

It would seem Kunemon has something he would
like to show you.
Kewkeww!
He does? I wonder what it could be.
Kewww!

It seems Kunemon has made some equipment for
Ryo. Here, take a look.
Uh...what is it?
Kew...

To be honest, we are not the most well-
informed when it comes to human equipment.

For that reason, Kunemon would like your
opinion on its merits and quality.
I see...
Kewkew, kewee!

He asks for your honest opinion. Takuma, what
do you think of this equipment?

(What do I think of it? I’m not sure I even
know what it’s supposed to be.)

(Still, I’m sure Kunemon worked very hard
making this for Ryo.)

(I’d like to tell Falcomon he did a good job,
but Falcomon did ask for an honest opinion.)
(What’s my impression, here...?)
This is well-made!
This is terrible!
I’m not sure.
Oh, this is really well-made!
I bet Ryo will be thrilled with it too.
Kewww...?

Hm, Kunemon seems anxious about whether Ryo
will indeed be thrilled.

Well, Ryo may not always be the most
straightforward guy,

but he cares about you, Kunemon. From how
he’s been acting lately, that seems clear.
Kewkeww?! Kewww, kewww!

Haha, I think even I got that one. You look
really happy, Kunemon.
Kew!
He would like you to have this.
What? Are you sure?
Kewkew!

He says it is only a prototype, so he does
not mind. I would encourage you to take it.
This is terrible!
Kewww...
(Oh, that seemed to visibly upset Kunemon.)

(Maybe I should have sugar-coated it a bit
more.)

Well... It might not look great, but I’m sure
Ryo will appreciate the sentiment!
Kew, kewww...
Hm, Kunemon seems satisfied.
Kew!
He says he would like you to have this.
Uh, are you sure?
Kewkew!

He says it is only a prototype, so he does
not mind. I would encourage you to take it.
I’m not sure.
Kew?
Hmm... Then let us reserve judgment.
Kew!
He says he would like you to have this.
Really? For me?
Kewkew!

He says it is only a prototype, so he does
not mind. I would encourage you to take it.

That will be all, Takuma. Thank you for your
time.
Keweekewwee!
It’s about Kunemon.

As you know, he was unable to communicate
with you humans.

Yeah. Apparently he had a hard time
communicating properly.

If Kunemon had been more concerned with this,
and if he had gotten through to Ryo...

...I believe things may not have turned out
as they did.
Yeah, I think you’re probably right.

And yet, Kunemon tried his best in his own
way.
He thought to communicate using actions, not words.
He did?

Yes. Kunemon made a piece of equipment for
Ryo. This is the result.
Uh...what is it?

I’m afraid I’m not sure, except that it is
equipment made for a human.

I cannot speak to its merits or its quality
either. That’s why I’m asking you.
Oh, I get it...

Tell me truthfully. What do you think of this
equipment?

(What do I think of it? I don’t even know
what it’s supposed to be.)

(Still, I’m sure Kunemon worked very hard
making this for Ryo.)

(I’d like to tell Falcomon he did a good job,
but Falcomon did ask for an honest opinion.)
(What’s my impression, here...?)
It’s really well-made!
This is terrible!
I’m not sure.
It’s really well-made!

I’m sure Ryo would’ve been thrilled to have
it.
Do you truly think so?

Well, Ryo was pretty mean to Kunemon, and he
wasn’t the most straightforward guy,

but if they’d spent more time together, I’m
sure they’d have gotten along eventually.
I see. Kunemon would no doubt be pleased.

Thank you, Takuma. You may take it, if you
wish.
What? Are you sure?

It was only ever meant as a prototype, and
I have no use for such a thing.
This is terrible!
I see. Well, thank you for speaking frankly.

(Maybe I should have sugar-coated it a bit
more.)

(After all, Kunemon did work very hard on it,
I’m sure.)

Well... It might not look great, but I’m sure
Ryo would’ve appreciated the sentiment.

I see. No doubt Kunemon would have been
pleased to hear that.
You may have this, if you wish.
Uh, are you sure?

It was only ever meant as a prototype, and
I have no use for such a thing.
I’m not sure.
Hmm... Then let us reserve judgment.
There is one thing I can say, though.
Oh? What is that?

It reminds me of Kunemon. In that sense,
I think it’s well done.

I see. In that case, I will leave this to
you.
Really? Are you sure?

It was only a prototype, and I have no use
for such a thing. I’d like you to have it.
I’m sorry I troubled you with this, Takuma.
Kewwwy kew, kew!
Kunemon thanks you for your feedback.

Your opinion was informative. Thank you for
your time.
